title: Bokura wa Minna Uso Bakari
original_name: ぼくらはみんなうそばかり
sinopse: 1-2. Bokura wa Minna Uso Bakari (The Endless Lies We Tell) 3. Kamiato ni Pride (Pride and Pain) 4. Kamiato ni Pride After (After Pride and Pain) 5. Fuhoni nagara Hodasarete Shimaimashita (A Love I Wasn't Expecting) 6. Utakata Koizoushi (A Fleeting Love's Fairytale)
